verbose_text: In immortalized human keratinocytes (HaCaT cells), we further proved that Kindlin-1 was necessary for mediating EGF induced activation signals, including integrin beta1 activation, focal adhesion kinase (FAK) phosphorylation and actin re-organization, which finally led to enhanced cell proliferation and migration.
evidence: EGF-induced activation signals, including integrin beta1 activation, focal adhesion kinase (FAK
